Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Just as Megatron orders the Decepticons to retreat, the mysterious robot from 
the Infecticons arrives on the scene. He flys and hovers down onto the ground 
a short distance from megatron, his arms crossed, his black, red, and grey 
form gleaming in the sunlight. The field of energy that surrounds him then 
dissapears and an intense shockwave is sent out from his body knocking large 
boulders away from him.

????: "So the decepticons have been defeated despite the Maximal base having 
been incapacitated. This news is most unsettling, yet I can not help but feel 
obligated to make sure the Maximals lose this day. It is now time to seperate 
the weak from the strong here... the weak ones being the Maximals. 
Decepticons, do not give up and combat the Maximals. Fight to your deaths if 
neccesary!"

The bot just continued to stand there, bolts of energy gliding along the 
smooth metallic plates of his armor.

--part1_108.7d7ff64.29146140_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
